description.narrative: Appeal 3E081 launched 20 November 2012 following recurring violence in Middle East region. Appeal 3E082 launched on 07 March to focus on Syria and Syrian refugees in host countries in line with DEC appeal, which was then jointly launched on 21 March 2013.

mailing-address.narrative: Christian Aid, 35-41 Lower Marsh, London SE1 7RL, United Kingdom

sector.code: EMERGENCY RESPONSE – WATER, SANITATION AND HYGIENE

description.narrative: Internal allocation from income source to partner project
